```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(x = Species, y = Sepal.Length)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill = "green") +
  theme_classic() +
  labs( y = "Sepal Length") -> plot1

ggsave("practice_plot.png", plot1 )
```
